node.title: Cross Entropy : An intuitive explanation with Entropy and  KL-Divergence
node.excerpt: Cross-Entropy is something that you see over and over in machine learning and deep learning. This article explains it from Information theory prespective and try to connect the dots. KL-Divergence is also very important and is used in Decision Trees and generative models like Variational Auto Encoders.
